ComicInfo.Summary: Kevin Matchstick, Kirby Hero, and the Presbyter descend down into the faerie realms. They find a midnight maze being guarded by Cerberus. They fight him, but get knocked into the maze. Kirby and Kevin escape, but the Presbyter is lost inside. The two go on. The Sprigginflints drop a rock on Kevin, and Kirby has to pull it off. They finally find Joe and beat the Leanhaun Sidhe with the help of the bogart that they saved from the Sprigginflints earlier. Kevin heals Joe with the Bat, and the three of them continue deeper into Emil's realm.
